comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: The photo caption is incorrect.  This is not a World War II-era Yermolayev Yer-2 bomber, but the prototype of the unsuccessful Mikoyan-Gurevich (MiG) Ye-8 fighter from the early 1960s.  Only two were built.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
